tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Took her online for Music Appreciation and I loved it. Super easy, work at your own pace through the semester. Two music performance papers at the end, but they were super simple. Definitely recommend her!

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Professor Mayer loves participation she wont make you get up from your seat or put you on the spot light but she likes to have conversations when she lectures, which helps us be more involved. You do have to do performance reports and a few take home test and there is a listening test also which are fairly easy. I had so much fun in this course.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: She was cool, i had like a 150 in her class

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Easiest A you can get. Review sheet covers everything for the exams. Sometimes the tests are even open book! Lots of extra credit questions too, you have to try hard NOT to get an A in this class

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: She\'s very nice!! Very clear on everything. Pretty Easy class. Just do the work she assigns and you\'ll get a good grade. Her test reviews are VERY Helpful. Know that and you\'ll ace the tests, SOMETIMES she\'ll let you use the review and notes during the test too. I recommend ms mayer, shes really cool :)

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: this class is VERY easy, the first 2 weeks might seem a little difficult... but like she told us, "dont worry, it gets A LOT easier" and it truly does, tests are SUPER easy, the review covers EVERYTHING that will be on it, she takes notes on the board, and all you do is copy them down and your good to go... take this class if you need an easy A

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I loved this class! Her tests are realllllly easy to understand. The only problem was the listening tests, you have to pay attention and go to class. Notes are easy and she makes the class fun! i took music appreciation and loved it, you don\'t need to be a music expert. Very understanding and helpful.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I took her American music class. She made the material flow nicely and kept it simple. Tests were not difficult, the reviews were very helpful. Plenty of note taking, but the class is a breeze as long as you pay attention. Good professor I highly recommend taking her class.
